titles.title: Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2011
Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2011
To authorize the Secretary of Energy to establish monetary prizes for achievements in designing and proposing nuclear energy used fuel alternatives.

bill.summary:
Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2011 - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to implement a program to award cash prizes competitively for research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of nuclear used fuel storage.
Authorizes the Secretary to enter into an agreement with a private, nonprofit entity to administer the prize competition.
